comment: Very nice and extremely helpful! Lectures are pretty boring, but paper topics are usually flexible and she offers a lot of feedback. Grading is great (and helpful) and allows revisions.
Easy grader and incredibly sweet. The writing topics are really open, flexible, and often interesting. Lectures during class were pretty boring, but the environment is relaxed.

Great professor. Just great. If you are unsure on what professor to take for English 1101, look no further. Plenty of time for the assignments, revisions are allowed, extremely nice and helpful. I sincerely enjoyed this class and the assignments. This is coming from a person that despises writing.

Best teacher I've ever had. Super nice and extremely helpful. She lets you fix essays/assignments for a chance at a better grade if you turn them in on time. Class was interesting and fun. I would recommend her to everyone, especially people who dislike english because after you have her you will enjoy it!
